name: DominikAngerer
body:
- Oberösterreich, Österreich
- +436644191439
- me@dominikangerer.com
- http://www.dominikangerer.com/


I'm Dominik Angerer, a fullstack web developer from Austria with an eye for the detail and performance as well. If you are interested in working with me, feel free to contact me.

I was able to and still will collect coding experience in many different technologies during my projects [Netural][1], [Roomle][3], [Lanora][2], [Wallsplash][4] and as a [freelancer][5].

- Simple & clean design only for you and your audience. I'm not the biggest designer, but I love to play with new idea's and put it in an image.
- Delivery of HTML5 / CSS3 in responsive design displayed wonderful across platforms. (smartphones, tablets and desktops)
- Quick and efficient coding following the idea of an RESTfull API in no time, making you and the frontend developers smile all over their face.

<a href="http://stackoverflow.com/users/1581725/dominikangerer">
<img src="http://stackoverflow.com/users/flair/1581725.png?theme=clean" width="208" height="58" alt="profile for DominikAngerer at Stack Overflow, Q&amp;A for professional and enthusiast programmers" title="profile for DominikAngerer at Stack Overflow, Q&amp;A for professional and enthusiast programmers">
</a>


  [1]: http://netural.com
  [2]: http://lanora.io
  [3]: http://roomle.com
  [4]: http://wallsplashapp.com
  [5]: http://dominikangerer.com

---
## Technical Skills
**Like:** java, php, mysql, javascript, wordpress, jpa, web-services, json, html5, ajax, sql, html, spring, github, git, jquery, jquery-mobile, adobe, css, xhtml, rest, restful, api, restful-authentication, oauth, oauth-2.0, js, node, nosql, ember, ember-js, angular

---
##Experience

**Fullstack Web- & Backenddeveloper**, Netural GmbH, *May 2014 - Current*

java, php, mysql, html, css, javascript, ajax, gentics, gentics-api, wordpress, spring, github, git, sql, jquery, jquery-mobile, adobe, xhtml, rest, restful, api, restful-authentication, oauth, oauth-2.0, js, node, nosql, xml, json, ember, ember-js, angular, node.js

I'm currently __Fullstack Webdeveloper__ for an _austrian media agency_ called __Netural__, building innovative and beautiful applications with state of the art technologies. We are building beautiful apps, websites and of course all in between and around. Seeing the beauty yet not feeling the complexity. Since 1998, Netural has been developing cutting edge solutions for sophisticated clients who compete in increasingly digitized environments. In doing this, strategic thinking is our tool of choice.

<a href="http://netural.com">www.netural.com</a>

---

**Working Together**, Lanora.io, *January 2014 - Current*

java, wordpress, html, spring, github, git, mysql, php, sql, jquery, jquery-mobile, adobe, css, xhtml, rest, restful, api, restful-authentication, oauth, oauth-2.0, javascript, js, node, nosql, xml, json, ajax, ember, ember-js, angular

Hello, we are lanora.io and we are creating clean and modern content,
ranging from the world-wide web and to native apps. Everything we do is crafted
with love and passion. Get your own individual product with ♡ now.

__GRAPHIC DESIGN__

Simple & clean design only for you and your audience. We are not the biggest designer, but we love to play with new idea's and put it in an image that will reach your taste.

__WEB DEVELOPMENT__

Delivery of HTML5 / CSS3 in responsive design displayed wonderfully across platforms and coding following the idea of tommorow, making you and your costumer smile.

__MOBILE APPS__

Developing the handheld future which will offer your users the best experience for their Android and iOS devices. Go with us for your unique solution.

<a href="http://www.lanora.io">www.lanora.io</a>

---

**Freelancer**, DominikAngerer.com, *September 2011 - Current*

website-development, project-management, sass, web-content-management, custom-cms-development, wordpress, wordpress-development, php, oracle, oracle-sql, sql, git, github, tortoise, svn, virtualization, ember.js, performance-improvement, software, web-content-optimizing, teamwork, concept, java-enterprise-edition

__Design__

Simple & clean design only for you and your audience. I'm not the biggest designer, but I love to play with new idea's and put it in an image.

__Frontend__

Delivery of HTML5 / CSS3 in responsive design displayed wonderful across platforms. (smartphones, tablets and desktops)

__Backend__

Simple and eficient coding following the idea of an RESTfull API in no time, making you and the frontend developers smile all over their face.

Portfolio: <a href="http://www.dominikangerer.com">www.dominikangerer.com</a>

---

##Education

**Ing. [software engineering]**, HTL Leonding, *2009 - 2013*


I was a student at the upper secondary technical and vocational college in Leonding, where I attended the department for informatics and software engineering. I learned the basics about software engineering and focused myself on web technologies and how to make the world for an frontend developer easier than it was before. Following the idea of an RESTFull API and the goal to create code that make other think about in a _good_ way.

---


##Projects & Interests

**Stack Overflow**, [http://stackoverflow.com/users/1581725](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1581725), *August 2012 - Current*


Written 82 answers.  Active in html, css and google-chrome.

---

**GitHub - trackz.io/ember-client**, [https://github.com/trackzio/ember-client](https://github.com/trackzio/ember-client), *January 2015 - February 2015*

ember, emberjs, ember-data, ember.js, javascript, css, scss, sass, rest

This is the first example written with the beatufil emberjs framework. 
  
I'm owner and developer of the ember client from trackz.io. The main features you can see there are developed by me. ;)

---

**Wallsplash - the cutting edge wallpaper app**, [http://wallsplashapp.com/](http://wallsplashapp.com/)

java, mysql, android, performance, api, caching, database

wallsplash the cutting edge wallpaper app for your device! - Wallpaper for everyone - wallsplash comes with tones of new wallpaper and provides them with a perfectly fluid user…
  
I'm currently the backend developer for the app wallsplash & also the server administrator. We are developing this beautiful app for currently 20k+ Users (fast growing) have a look at it: http://wallsplashapp.com

---

**GitHub - DominikAngerer/bearded-cyril**, [https://github.com/DominikAngerer/bearded-cyril](https://github.com/DominikAngerer/bearded-cyril), *January 2015 - February 2015*

css, css3, sass, scss

Bearded Cyril? It was the best name I could figure out... no, just joking, it was the recommendation from github and I though: why not ;)
  
Creator & Developer: Bearded Cyril will be a free to use template for let's say minimalistic photographers. But of course it could be used for many more.

---

**TrackZ**, [http://trackz.io/](http://trackz.io/)

java, ember, android, google-maps, google-maps-api, rest, json

What is TrackZ?

TrackZ is a realtime position streaming service with focus on simplicity and privacy. Every track is only defined by the url you share and gets deleted after a week by default.
  
Owner, Developer (Backend & Frontend)

---

**GitHub - DominikAngerer/MaterialWebAppTemplate**, [https://github.com/DominikAngerer/MaterialWebAppTemplate](https://github.com/DominikAngerer/MaterialWebAppTemplate), *November 2014*

css, css3, sass, scss, html, html5, responsive-design, responsiveness

A Material WebApp Template - simple to modify and with no javascript.
  
I'm the creator of the whole project, including: concept, idea and implementation.

---

**GitHub - DominikAngerer/example-nodejs**, [https://github.com/DominikAngerer/example-nodejs](https://github.com/DominikAngerer/example-nodejs), *July 2014 - February 2015*

javascript, nodejs, mysql, rest

5 easy examples for nodeJs starter
  
I wanted to have a look at nodejs so i made this little example for (at first) myself and after a while my team member also wanted to have a look at it, some other could also want to have an example, so here it is.

---

**GitHub - ModernJenkins**, [https://github.com/DominikAngerer/ModernJenkins](https://github.com/DominikAngerer/ModernJenkins), *August 2014*

css, css3

Taking Jenkins to another level of beautyness. With this little css you can make more out of your jenkins.
  
We (mikepenz, thomaspink, dominikangerer) made a little and nice css so your jenkins will look more like you want it to - the easy way. Kicking the blue circles for success and replacing it with wonderful green boxes. Have a look at this project if you are using jenkins for your builds.

---

**GitHub - wall-splash-android**, [https://github.com/wallsplash/wall-splash-android](https://github.com/wallsplash/wall-splash-android), *March 2015 - April 2015*

java, rest, api, mysql, performance, caching

wall:splash is a free open source android client for the awesome unsplash.com service (Free (do whatever you want) high-resolution photos)
  
I'm currently the backend developer and server administrator for the app wallsplash.I also develop new crawler for image sources to get more images for our users.

---

In times where Spring.io or the PlayFramework are state of the art technologies there are projects in the world which needs some extra attention, maybe an old backend where only the frontend should…

---

**Show current row count using Formatter · Pull Request**, [https://github.com/wenzhixin/bootstrap-table/pull/443](https://github.com/wenzhixin/bootstrap-table/pull/443)


Added Example to show row count. This is also the answer to #411 and will help to improve bootstrap-table

---

**Where to put forms / alternative views in a RESTful html app?**, [http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24696982/where-to-put-forms-alternative-views-in-a-restful-html-app](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24696982/where-to-put-forms-alternative-views-in-a-restful-html-app)


You have a website like, the one way to build a real RESTFull API is to split the frontend and the API - thats in my opinion the best way (some may disagree) - maybe some other don't think like this but lets say the frontend team got www.domain and your team for the API got api.domain.

---
